Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to monthly rental assistance payments for households with rental assistance vouchers
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Monthly rental assistance payments for households with rental assistance vouchers.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the department of social services from requiring an applicant for a rental assistance voucher to have resided or reside in a shelter of any type, and to repeal sections 21-145.1 and 21-145.2 of such code in relation thereto
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting the department of social services from requiring an applicant for a rental assistance voucher to have resided or reside in a shelter of any type.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to expanding eligibility for rental assistance to any applicant at risk of eviction or experiencing homelessness
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Expanding eligibility for rental assistance to any applicant at risk of eviction or experiencing homelessness.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to income and work requirements for rental assistance
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Income and work requirements for rental assistance.
